item.title: Custom Bearing Puller in The Making
item.description: The team machines and assembles a custom bearing puller, designing a practical shop-made tool to handle heavy-duty removal jobs.

media:content.media:title: Custom Bearing Puller in The Making
media:content.media:description: The team machines and assembles a custom bearing puller, designing a practical shop-made tool to handle heavy-duty removal jobs.

item.title: Upgrades to the Zayer Milling Machine
item.description: he Zayer mill gets a fresh round of improvements to boost accuracy, efficiency, and workflow. This piece highlights the new components, the installation process, and how each upgrade enhances performance in the workshop.

media:content.media:title: Upgrades to the Zayer Milling Machine
media:content.media:description: he Zayer mill gets a fresh round of improvements to boost accuracy, efficiency, and workflow. This piece highlights the new components, the installation process, and how each upgrade enhances performance in the workshop.

item.title: Franna Crane Project — Removing the Cab
item.description: The Franna crane build moves forward as the cab comes off for inspection and repair. This segment follows the lifting process, the prep work, and what comes next in the restoration.

media:content.media:title: Franna Crane Project — Removing the Cab
media:content.media:description: The Franna crane build moves forward as the cab comes off for inspection and repair. This segment follows the lifting process, the prep work, and what comes next in the restoration.

item.title: Saving the Cat D9 Bulldozer Yoke from the Scrapyard
item.description: A worn and damaged D9 yoke arrives on the brink of being discarded. This piece follows the inspection, machining, and repair work needed to bring the component back to life and keep a hardworking bulldozer in service.

media:content.media:title: Saving the Cat D9 Bulldozer Yoke from the Scrapyard
media:content.media:description: A worn and damaged D9 yoke arrives on the brink of being discarded. This piece follows the inspection, machining, and repair work needed to bring the component back to life and keep a hardworking bulldozer in service.

item.title: The Joys of Working with Thin Material
item.description: Thin metal can be unforgiving — one wrong move and it warps or tears. This piece explores the challenges, the decision to repair or replace, and the techniques that help keep delicate material under control.

media:content.media:title: The Joys of Working with Thin Material
media:content.media:description: Thin metal can be unforgiving — one wrong move and it warps or tears. This piece explores the challenges, the decision to repair or replace, and the techniques that help keep delicate material under control.

item.title: This Broken Cylinder Eye Needs a Makeover
item.description: A damaged cylinder eye undergoes a full restoration. From assessing the wear to machining and rebuilding, this piece highlights the process of returning a critical part to working order.

media:content.media:title: This Broken Cylinder Eye Needs a Makeover
media:content.media:description: A damaged cylinder eye undergoes a full restoration. From assessing the wear to machining and rebuilding, this piece highlights the process of returning a critical part to working order.

item.title: Straightening Bent Metal with the Hydraulic Press
item.description: A bent component gets a second chance as the hydraulic press applies controlled force to bring it back into shape. This breakdown shows the setup, the technique, and the satisfaction of a clean correction.

media:content.media:title: Straightening Bent Metal with the Hydraulic Press
media:content.media:description: A bent component gets a second chance as the hydraulic press applies controlled force to bring it back into shape. This breakdown shows the setup, the technique, and the satisfaction of a clean correction.

item.title: Metal Arc Spray Prep — Undercut and Rough Threading the Yoke
item.description: Before metal arc spraying can begin, the yoke needs precise machining. This segment covers cutting the undercut, rough threading, and preparing the part for its next stage of repair.

media:content.media:title: Metal Arc Spray Prep — Undercut and Rough Threading the Yoke
media:content.media:description: Before metal arc spraying can begin, the yoke needs precise machining. This segment covers cutting the undercut, rough threading, and preparing the part for its next stage of repair.

item.title: This Cylinder Eye Is in Dire Need of Help
item.description: A worn and damaged cylinder eye arrives in rough shape. This piece follows the inspection, machining prep, and the steps needed to bring it back to safe working condition.

media:content.media:title: This Cylinder Eye Is in Dire Need of Help
media:content.media:description: A worn and damaged cylinder eye arrives in rough shape. This piece follows the inspection, machining prep, and the steps needed to bring it back to safe working condition.

item.title: Answering Your Questions — Q&A Time
item.description: From machining techniques to workshop tools, this session tackles the questions viewers ask most. Clear explanations and practical insights make it a helpful look behind the scenes.

media:content.media:title: Answering Your Questions — Q&A Time
media:content.media:description: From machining techniques to workshop tools, this session tackles the questions viewers ask most. Clear explanations and practical insights make it a helpful look behind the scenes.

item.title: DIY Heavy‑Duty Drop‑Bottom Bins for the Workshop
item.description: Strong, practical, and built to last — these custom drop‑bottom bins make material handling easier. This breakdown shows the design, fabrication steps, and how they improve workflow in a busy shop.

media:content.media:title: DIY Heavy‑Duty Drop‑Bottom Bins for the Workshop
media:content.media:description: Strong, practical, and built to last — these custom drop‑bottom bins make material handling easier. This breakdown shows the design, fabrication steps, and how they improve workflow in a busy shop.

item.title: Dustless Blasting in Action — Stripping Paint and Rust
item.description: The RapidBlast system goes to work as old paint and rust disappear, revealing a clean surface ready for machining and repair. This piece highlights the process, the equipment, and the results of dustless blasting in the workshop.

media:content.media:title: Dustless Blasting in Action — Stripping Paint and Rust
media:content.media:description: The RapidBlast system goes to work as old paint and rust disappear, revealing a clean surface ready for machining and repair. This piece highlights the process, the equipment, and the results of dustless blasting in the workshop.
